xwikidoc.name: SearchGridTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: SearchGridTranslations
xwikidoc.content:
## SearchGrid rendering.macro.searchGrid.name=Search Grid rendering.macro.searchGrid.description=Performs a Solr search and display results in a grid with facets on top rendering.macro.searchGrid.parameter.class.name=XWiki Class rendering.macro.searchGrid.parameter.class.description=XWiki Class to be used for the query, i.e.: Movies.MovieClass rendering.macro.searchGrid.parameter.facets.name=Properties to be shown as facets rendering.macro.searchGrid.parameter.facets.description=Example: director,category rendering.macro.searchGrid.parameter.showHidden.name=Display hidden pages rendering.macro.searchGrid.parameter.sort.name=Property used by default to sort the results rendering.macro.searchGrid.parameter.sort.description=Default value: title:asc rendering.macro.searchGrid.parameter.filter.name=Additional filter rendering.macro.searchGrid.parameter.filter.description=Filter to be added to the query searchGrid.sortBy=Sort by searchGrid.textSearch.title=Search searchGrid.doc.author=Author searchGrid.doc.creator=Creator searchGrid.doc.date=Last Update searchGrid.doc.hidden=Hidden searchGrid.doc.title=Title
## SearchGridCell rendering.macro.searchGridCell.name=Search Grid Cell rendering.macro.searchGridCell.description=Controls the display of a cell in a Search Grid
## SearchGridCellTabs rendering.macro.searchGridTabs.name=Search Grid Tabs rendering.macro.searchGridTabs.description=Displays several Search Grids in tabs
